website_summaries.verdict: Classic looks, lots of features, and an affordable price makes this little jukebox an excellent addition to any room with vintage-themed decor.
pros: A beautiful retro tabletop model that stands out for resembling the classic Victrola models
In addition to its old-fashioned looks, it sports modern technology, including LED lighting, FM radio, Bluetooth and CD player
cons: Rare reports of the CD door jamming
Radio stations can be difficult to program in some areas with poor reception

customer_reviews.title: I love it so much
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much! I have the volume low in the video. Money well spent! It goes perfect with my vintage 50's/60's decor dinning room. And it's actually bigger then expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Marie

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great, easy to set up blue tooth and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great, easy to set up blue tooth and I can receive a radio station. Other radios did not pick up radio station because I live in the country. Lightning is very neat too.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly J Greene

customer_reviews.title: It looks good and it works great!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this!! It is so unique and it works great!! I am thrilled to own this little jukebox!! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett

customer_reviews.title: This is by far one of the most awesome purchases I have made for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the most awesome purchases I have made for the money. It is absolutely beautiful and adds character to my kitchen/bar. So many compliments and the speaker is adequate but the lights are outstanding! The purchase was easy and way better than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Michael F Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Nice jukebox
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for his birthday back in December...he loved it! Plays good, has great sound! You won't be disappointed if you purchase this. Lights up...one color or 3-4 colors while it plays...or you can leave it off
customer_reviews.author: vicki muoio

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. It is pretty and does everything it says ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. It is pretty and does everything it says it does. Just wish the light where it says disc would turn off. The light bothers me when I try to sleep. Other than unplugging it we have yet to figure out how to turn the backlight off,
customer_reviews.author: Tina2

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for sisters kids for Christmas last year, they brought over for BBQ party I had & loved it, so bought for myself next day, for $40 cheaper than what I paid for theirs. Just did a complete renovation of backyard and this is perfect under patio addition. Love the light it’s has at night. Great buy great price. My only drawback is that it is loud that would like louder so all of backyard could hear. He could add speakers but haven’t figured out how to do that and still have I Phone paired to it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Barnett

customer_reviews.title: This little thing is amazing. I had it delivered to my work and ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom who's always wanted a real jukebox. This little thing is amazing. I had it delivered to my work and set it up to test it. Customer kept asking about it. Sound is good and reception is good also. My employees agreed to pitch in and purchase one for the store. Really like that the tubes don't get hit we had it playing for over 3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Doomsday

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but cd player didn’t work for very long
customer_reviews.text: Good looking. Seems to made well. Bought for my wife to play CDs. Stopped working after a couple weeks. Bluetooth worked. Radio worked.
customer_reviews.author: Charles B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GIFT FOR FATHER IN-LAW HE LOVED IT. GREAT SOUND QUALITY !!!
customer_reviews.author: JohnandSherri

customer_reviews.title: Looks - great! Yes
customer_reviews.text: Looks - great! Yes, it's plastic and if you touch it, it feels cheap, but it looks great from a few feet away. My major gripe is that you can't ever turn it off completely and CDs skip in the same place all the time. But I like to look at it, even if it isn't as usable as Id' like.
customer_reviews.author: HDavis

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and buy this thing right now. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice
customer_reviews.text: The lights have 5 different color modes. They can alternate or you can have a solid color. There is a switch in the back for the lights. The Bluetooth works great easy to pair, cd player works good nice sound. The speakers don't rumble or get muffled when the volume is all the way up. Cons ; the function buttons located on the front are hard to see. Should have led lights above the function buttons so you can eastly see them . The Led lights should flash with the music Overall this is a nice unit and I would buy again. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Love this Jukebox CD player
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this CD player with FM radio for my 12 year old granddaughter for Christmas. I had opened it and tried it before giving it to her. Easy to use, great sound, and so cute! She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I like this jukebox. It sounds great and looks awesome in the dark. I like all the options on it too. The only problems I have with it is it doesn’t run through CDs cleanly. When a song continues into the next track the jukebox stops a second before the next track. It’s just s little annoying. Also when it’s plugged in, if you turn the lights off it makes this weird electric whining sound which doesn’t stop till you turn the lights back on or unplug it. Despite these I still like this device. Just be aware this might affect you.
customer_reviews.author: CookieDoughAvenger

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great gift.
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about getting this product since I saw some of the other reviews (yes, I read them). I saw how some of the products did not work and all the negative aspects of it. Well, mine works just fine and the daughter loves it. This is a product that I believe she will enjoy for years to come. She loves listening to her music (she is 6, by the way) and she loves the fact that it can double as a night light if she wants to use it that way. Overall, very happy kiddo.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Everything except the CD worked flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: The CD worked on occasion, like it would try to read the CD, but somehow didn't spin almost as if the CD was too heavy (I used old and new CDs of different quality) and I don't know if it's mine that has that problem. Other than that, it's a great speaker for the price! It had great sound quality, it can get pretty loud for a medium sized speaker, and you can use the aux or bt if your CD isn't working either, which is the main reason I bought it any ways , the other stuff is just added bonuses.
customer_reviews.author: Sirenia

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Truly like... but radio station are not easy to program...
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Radio Didn't work, Vendor Bailed and Amazon Rescued
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cd player/radio because of the jukebox design and the changing lights. The motif doesn't matter if the product doesn't work. There was no reception to the radio, which was confirmed by testing it in 3 different locations (that were more than 15 miles apart). Vendor response (to my 3 emails, 5 phone call attempts, and one conversation) was awful. Amazon ended up rescuing the situation and honored my damage claim. Vendor has not come forth to fix the situation. Be warned.
customer_reviews.author: Katsnjabber

customer_reviews.title: Great CD player/bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Got this on a black Friday sale. It works great and looks great! The light changes color, which is fun. Great sound quality and volume! I would buy it again or give it for a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blingy and Functional
customer_reviews.text: If you like a retro look like this, it's a terrific buy and looks better in person than pics. It's not going to give concert like sound but for a cool looking piece in this price range, the sound is pretty good. The colors change automatically but you also have the choice to turn it off, like if you're playing music to sleep. The lights are pretty and fairly bright. It looks like it should cost more and it doesn't feel real cheaply made. I expected a more light plastic feel in this price range but feels a step above.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Carlson

customer_reviews.title: 1 unfortunate star
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter. For 6 months it worked just fine and she loved the machine with its lights and old timey appearance. Today the CD player stopped working. I submitted a technical request with Victrola but I don’t have high hopes in them agreeing to repairs or a replacement. My daughter is naturally upset and I feel bad for getting her a player that stopped working so quickly
customer_reviews.author: Renee S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to replace my MIL CD player. She is 91 and enjoys listening to music from her era on CD. After she received this from us, she kept trying to find the place for her nickle! Lol. She was pleased to learn that it was "free". She is a sharp and highly functioning 91 year old woman. She just thought of the jukebox of her days and you had to pay. She loves the sound quality. It is much better than the old one she previously used. She wasn't a fan of the bright lights, so we are happy that you are able to turn that feature off.
customer_reviews.author: AME139

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME LITTLE HIPPIE ITEM AND HAS A GREAT SOUND!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received in only 3 days and am happy so far with the JukeBox. Radio works great, the strobe lights are pretty nice and it will also allow the light to be a solid color. And can pick up numerous local FM stations. I'm VERY pleased w/it so far. I would recommend this for any teenager who knows what an old fashioned JukeBox and CD looks like! Or just for an old time Hippie that has everything!!! LOL Here's a pic on top of the small dresser I bought here as well. I used my own knobs on the dresser though.
customer_reviews.author: apieceofdenise

customer_reviews.title: Great little CD player!
customer_reviews.text: First the negative: people on the question and answers should not answer questions that they don't understand. That being said it does NOT play mp3 cd's only regular cd's. Though it would be nice if it did. Now for the positive: I was impressed at how large it was for the price. Second the lights are awesome and the sound quality is excellent and I was surprised at how loud the volume got. Overall this is a fantastic CD player worth twice the price I paid!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Samuel A. Oganezov Jr.

customer_reviews.title: This jukebox is even better than described
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this Jukebox miniature. The quality of the sound , CD + radio + aux, I don't use Bluetooth, is exceptional. The jukebox gives you a choice of colors. The colors will rotate or you can set the color you prefer. The instructions are to the point. Easy to understand. I have this in my garage. It really is very sharp looking and has a fairly deep bass sound.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby B.

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST GIFT for my 5yr old Granddaughter EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to our granddaughter for her 5th birthday...and she has used it every single day since. Now she had a collection of CD's covering all the classics, ballet themed, Disney music from all the children's shows, Storybooks read aloud, etc., etc. We often send a new CD or two to add to her collection, which is easy to do and costs very little. She also loves getting mail, not to mention a new collection of music or stories. How cool is that? To say she was beyond thrilled is an understatement,,,
customer_reviews.author: Angel Dog

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great, WHEN IT AIN'T SKIPPING LIKE A KID PLAYING HOP SCOTCH! First CD I put in it it skipped. Tried several more and still skips. Went and bought some brand new CD's just in case it was my old CD's. Still skips! Cabinet and looks are great, light show is nice. Really wanted to love this player but not with it skipping like crazy. I'm not driving the 60 mile round trip to the nearest UPS store to send this back. I'll use it as a radio in my shop but I'm not happy at all. Don't waste you're money unless you can easily return it.
customer_reviews.author: Dano

customer_reviews.title: Fun and funtional
customer_reviews.text: We've used this for several months and we like it a lot. I will say the knobs are small but once you get used to them, you won't have any problems. I use this in my grandson's bedroom so he can listen to his lullaby CD while he naps or has a sleepover and it works great. It is backlit and you can turn that off if you want to. Good volume control and clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Whitworth

customer_reviews.title: Did Elvis Deliver This? WOW !!!
customer_reviews.text: Talk about getting a bang for your buck, this baby rocks. Okay, Elvis didn't deliver it but who cares because this thing is amazing. The construction is top notch and the sound is great. The light show is fabulous and the controls are simple. Seeing a CD spin while it's playing adds vintage charm. The only problem is my girlfriend is waiting in my retro kitchen for Elvis. Maybe I should "cook up" some love songs!!!.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!! One star 'cause I cound't give it a ZERO.
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing, this is worthless, the sound is terrible , can't be connected to Bluetooth speakers, can't play MP3 ( Aux ) only , no USB no MP3 cd reading. I purchased as a gift and returned it the same day. I believe it can be a 'SHOCK HAZZARD" so be careful to whom you give this as a present. I do not recommend this item.. Thanks for reading
customer_reviews.author: J. A.

customer_reviews.title: All great
customer_reviews.text: This product far exceeds what I wanted. I was just looking for an inexpensive CD player. This has a marvelous speaker and has FM radio as well as a very nice CD player. I am extremely happy with this purchase and with also it has a great look.
customer_reviews.author: Peter L. Ehrman

customer_reviews.title: Attractive but has flaws
customer_reviews.text: The design is attractive and it has good sound. It connects to bluetooth devices like our phones easily and the radio gets good reception. The LED lights are mostly cycling blue and green, not really any other colors. It makes a high pitched electrical whine when it is off that you only hear in a quiet room or if your hearing is good. Finally, the tiny buttons on this mini jukebox make changing inputs or radio stations a pain. A dial for that would be better. The volume dial works well.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.P

customer_reviews.title: Retro Jukebox with goodies
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after reading the positive reviews. I LOVE it! The sound quality is excellent for playing CDs and listening to the radio. I have not tried using it with blue ray yet. Friends who dropped in and their jaws dropped, watching the changing lights, its size and learning of its features. I ordered another one for a friend and she LOVES it. Its size is perfect, sitting on a shelf in the living/dining room and is definitely an attention getter.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy R.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality!!
customer_reviews.text: We have owned and tried nearly all of the radio/stereo options selling on amazon around this price point. They are terrible!! They stop working shortly after purchase and their sound quality is crap!! THIS jukebox style stereo is awesome!!!!! Not only is it different, but the sound quality is impressive for the price. The lights are perfect as a kids room night light too. We are so happy with this purchase! I highly recommend this stereo.
customer_reviews.author: E.R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Design but CD Player non functioning out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jukebox for my daughter as a Christmas present. The design is cool and the lights are a nice touch. Unfortunatley, the moment I openned the box the CD player was not functioning. I know most folks probably stream music via bluetooth (which worked flawlessly). However, I bought this device mainly due to the CD player given her CD collection of music. I have requested a replacement but it wont come until after Christmas. Hopefully the new one does not have issues. Will return to amend my review if the replacement has no problems.
customer_reviews.author: M. Vitellaro

customer_reviews.title: ehh...
customer_reviews.text: Not gonna return it, but if I could go back in time I would've never purchased this, the volume is not loud at all, everything else is fine... Update: ended up returning it. I feel better now.
customer_reviews.author: Idiosyncratic_rose

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my Aunt for her birthday because she had a lot of CD's and nothing to play them on. She absolutely loves it! We had dinner with her family and she never turned the thing off! Her grand kids showed her how to use the bluetooth feature and she is thrilled to be able to get any music she wants! I must say the sound is very good from this thing. I suspect it is going to get a lot of use. She put it right on her kitchen counter. She keeps the lights going too!
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Works great a year later
customer_reviews.text: Still works great a year later. No issues with sound or lights
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Retro Tabletop Jukebox.
customer_reviews.text: I read the other reviews so here's mine. Great sound, quality and appearance. When lighted, you feel like your ready to dance. (Yes it is bright-but you can turn lights off). CD/Buetooth has worked perfect for me so I am thinking the older ones had some issues. FM radio is very sensitive-picks up lots of stations clearly as long as the wired antennae is positioned correctly. A very nice jukebox radio player.
customer_reviews.author: E. Steiner

customer_reviews.title: It's cute and fun, and very attractive!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom several months ago, and was really pleased with the quality. It is easy to use, which it important where she is concerned. I later bought one for my dad, and recently again for my daughter. It's cute and fun, and very attractive! Good sound output, and provides a nice light source. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: B. L. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Greatest gift I ever gave myself!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best money I ever spent. Bought this for my birthday for myself. Sound is fantastic and the lights are the icing on the cake. Would recommend this great CD player to anyone especially those of us who remember the "jukebox ". Love it!
customer_reviews.author: PHM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE it!! This was a huge hit at my 1950s Party and the volume goes really high. Everyone was asking me were I got it so they can buy one as well
customer_reviews.author: jennyfer sand

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality; bought this for my husband's cave man.
customer_reviews.author: lettys

customer_reviews.title: Great Classic Look, Modern Options!
customer_reviews.text: This is the single best radio I have ever bought with Bluetooth toss in the FM radio and CD player and what more could you ask for. It’s like bringing the present into the past with the true to life retro look and feel of this timeless design. The added lighting effects are just simply amazing and in a push of a button turn off if desired. I would recommend this Mini-Jukebox to anyone with a love for the past but can’t live without the now!
customer_reviews.author: Grave Omega

customer_reviews.title: My son's favorite Xmas gift!
customer_reviews.text: My son saw a jukebox in a magazine and "needed" one for Christmas. saw this one and took a chance, what a great item! It produces good sound, on CD or radio (we haven't used the Bluetooth function, but it has the choice). I would love if it came with a remote, but not a big deal. You can use the sound and lights separately- so music/no lights, light/no music or both on.
customer_reviews.author: mamainMA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking jukebox!  Sounds great!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new jukebox. I bought it for my new office at work. It looks amazing and sounds great!! Plays radio, CD's and bluetooth. Incredible buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Shreve

customer_reviews.title: This is an absolutely amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY pleased by this product, I use it every day. Everything works great on it. The colors are awesome, although I wish they changed colors slower. I completely recommend buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Mom...definitely a Great buy! It's a beautiful piece, awesome sound! Mom Loves it! She's been playing her CD's that wouldn't play on several boom boxes we bought her that did not last more than a couple months. I would definitely buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: MIL Loves it
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my elderly mother in law as she likes to listen to the radio and has some CD's with oldie's but goodies on them. She got a big kick out of the jukebox style design and has been using it daily since we gave it to her last Christmas. It's a really nice and functional conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: SharkysWaters

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our home!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Christmas and have not regretted the choice! Music quality is good whether listening to radio or CD. Love that I can finally play CDs. Admittedly, I do occasionally have to look at the instructions as the buttons aren't obvious to me so I keep the instructions under the Jukebox. I like having a way to play music that doesn;t require me to turn on several pieces of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: VERY CUTE
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this as a Christmas gift.i opened it and tried it. Sound was good. I hope no issues after Christmas. I'm hoping I will be able to return if a problem arises.
customer_reviews.author: MARY BAILEY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can tell what station it's on. Sound is much better than my old radio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This jukebox is amazing and better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This jukebox is amazing and better than expected. My mother loved it, the only complaint I have is the lights on the jukebox change color but they don't change color based on the music it's just a static color change at present intervals, but I love that if there is a color I like I can pause the color change on that color and make it static.
customer_reviews.author: rcp90

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I’ve made on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it 10 stars, I would! It is so cute! To be honest, I wasn’t expecting much, but I’ve been wanting a radio or CD player in the kitchen for a long time, but just never found anything I really liked, decoratively speaking. This is amazing! The sound quality is excellent! We’re in a rural area (and that’s an understatement), so didn’t know what to expect....well, this is above & beyond what I imagined. Same with the CD player. Just plain 10 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Noel

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect. The neon lights are the icing on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Put this neat looking jukebox in my man-cave.Its perfect.The neon lights are the icing on the cake for this product!While it doesnt "crank" in the volumne dept,it works perfect for what i need.Blu-tooth works great,love the c.d. player and having an aux input is great for my mp3 player.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy J. Macia

customer_reviews.title: I bought this last year for 65.00!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is nice, I bought it as a Christmas gift for my mother. She loves it. It sounds good, the lights look cool HOWEVER. I paid 65.00 for this a year ago. Now its 250.00? That's just ridiculous. I would never have paid that much for it. Anyone who does is nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Seashell OsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not a CD player!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, as it said in customer reviews, it had a CD player in the front. The one I received had no C D player. The loudest volume is not very loud! The radio itself is cute and nostalgic, but we were disappointed as it is not a CD player!😞
customer_reviews.author: Karen Roy

customer_reviews.title: Static on Radio When Illuminated
customer_reviews.text: I would unreservedly love this jukebox if it weren't for the fact that mine has a flaw: when I'm using the radio function, I can't turn on the jukebox lights because they cause constant, fairly loud static that ruins the listening experience. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: DLLewis

customer_reviews.title: Great on Bluetooth speaker with Character
customer_reviews.text: The picture on Amazon doesn’t do it justice. It really is a little piece and the lights strobe been to the music around the unit is absolutely the coolest thing ever. Sound is great and some nice footprint not too bad for being enough to make a statement
customer_reviews.author: Handiandi

customer_reviews.title: Must have !
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase! It’s perfect for my kitchen 1950s diner theme. The sound quality is great and the volume plays at a decent loud level. The colors change or there’s a button on the back that you can choose to display one of the colors when lit up. You can also play music without the lights on. My kids love it too! I’m glad I splurged on this. Got it on sale for $60 but it would be worth the full price anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son-in-law for Christmas. He loved it so much that he took it to his office where it is a conversation piece and he also listens to music as he's working. It looks great and he is very happy with it. It's also a great conversation piece when customers come in.
customer_reviews.author: Karen F

customer_reviews.title: Great Product & Sound!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift, and it was a big hit! Everything works great! Since it has bluetooth they were able to play their Amazon playlist thru it, and it sounded great! We played CD’s, and the FM radio. It was very easy to setup the presets. The only negative thing I can say is if you’re looking for something that also has AM radio, this doesn’t. It wasn’t a problem for this person, but thought I’d mention it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: ... a CD player because she’s old school and doesn’t like iTunes, etc
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom who wanted a CD player because she’s old school and doesn’t like iTunes, etc. I really wasn’t sure what to expect but she loves it!! The sound is really good and it’s just plain cute. It lights up like the description states and it is really neat. I’ve very happy I took a risk and bought this!!
customer_reviews.author: Navi

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOUND
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great and I enjoy the retro look, it does not hurt that the radio jukebox lights up.
customer_reviews.author: steve byron

customer_reviews.title: Great Nostalgic Gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for a friend dating back to the 50s and they were thrilled with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Stoney

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! Once it's paired to a device, it stays paired. If I leave the house, when I come home, I don't have to reconnect it. The sound is very nice. It's bigger than I thought!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Dale

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I actually was looking for a cd boom box, but the reviews for most of them were awful. We have a larger cd juke box that has been going strong for 20 years and the excellent reviews for this convinced me. The sound quality is excellent, its size makes it perfect for the bookcase in my quilt studio and it’s pretty! I’m absolutely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old daughter LOVES this jukebox. She has it in her room and uses the Bluetooth with her iPhone. She also uses the radio which has good reception. She loves the LED lights and has been using this jukebox every day. Can't say I don't love it too/ Its been fun to use and keeps a cheerful glow. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Creed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super simple to set up. Looks great on the kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice retro look with pretty good sound.
customer_reviews.text: Cute cute CD player! I looked at so many and finally decided on this one after my old one broke. I was skeptical but it works perfectly. The lights are a neat feature. I would definitely recommend this to someone who just wants a simple cd/radio player.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rinker

customer_reviews.title: Design and Function
customer_reviews.text: I love this little CD player. The retro design fits right in with my decor. The sound is great and I love that it lights up. I bought it to play workout CDs and now use it all of the time. The only downside is that is plays only one CD.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Bobbitt

customer_reviews.title: Great item. Very stylish too
customer_reviews.text: Cute and readio/ CD work and sound great.also lights up.I don't have mp3 player. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: G. M. C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a teen!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my daughter who requested a CD player. I didn’t want just any old CD player though and this fit the bill nicely. Love the lights, colors, quality, sound and just everything. She’s a very happy teen and it looks great in her room!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Overall good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Just got it today and it sounds great and the lights are beautiful. I can’t stop looking at it. The smaller “u shaped tube” in the middle does not light up, nor is it supposed to. Good quality for the price. You can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Munn

customer_reviews.title: No Remote :(
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my very nostalgic friend who wanted to listen to his old CD's. It serves it's purpose but the sound quality isn't the best and it does not come with a remote to advance the tracks or change the station - that sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Lucretia Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: If you like retro 50's look no further. This tabletop CD player and bluetooth puts on a neat light feature, good sound quality, and easy to use. It's pretty big, so note the measurement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonwoman

customer_reviews.title: We Love It!
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing! We have a 50s diner themed kitchen and we use it daily! We’ve owned ours for a year and never encountered any problems or even wear and tear or anything. I highly suggest, plus it’s cute
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Brierton

customer_reviews.title: looks nice, radio works great, but CDs skip
customer_reviews.text: It picks up radio signals just fine even though I live in the middle of no where. The only issue I have is that some of my CDs skip after a while so I've stopped playing CDs in this. CDs that skip in the jukebox do not skip in other cd players. But man does it look cool!!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Tessier

customer_reviews.title: I really like this. Much better than anticipated for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. Much better than anticipated for the price. It has a CD player, radio, and Bluetooth. Lights work great and the sound is much better than expected for it's size. I bought this for my office, but it's so nice I opted to keep it for my "Elvis" style home office instead. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift for my wife, she had wanted an under the cabinet cd player but I couldn't find one worth a darn. I saw this and thought it was pretty cool..she loves it. The sound is better than I expected and the lights are great, especially at night. Would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and sounds good too. CD drawer is hard to open though.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had radio for 10 years. Nice to hear again
customer_reviews.author: reuben

customer_reviews.title: Not the best sound quality
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice looking I love the lights and size is also very easy to operated but the sound quality is very bad is not very clear and low I guess is ok for small office or room but not for a pool or big rooms
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a Christmas gift for my mother, who feels more comfortable having things around her from her past. It lights up different colors as it plays the CD's. It's an amazing player and anyone at any age would love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacobi331

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and look and features to boot
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother for Christmas and she loves it. Easy to connect to phone for Bluetooth plus with a 1,000 owned CDs plus of use for that piece as well.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this but it sounds tinny
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love the quality as well as the visual effect but I cannot. It sounds tinny & cant even hook it up to my sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: path66002

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Have in a hall where we have food to give some background while people wait. They were really pleased we added the music and so it seems to work well. Wish it had usb port but other than that we are happy wit it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so great!!! Was a birthday present and they loved it! Works perfectly, sounds good and looks so nice. Slightly larger than I expected and I'm really happy with it. Changing colors were a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Janet B.

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's very nice and decent
customer_reviews.text: Well you get what you pay for. I love the retro look of this player, however the sound isn't the greatest as to be expected with cheap built in speakers. Would of been better if they would of put in out put Jack's on the back to hook in external speakers, but unfortunately this doesn't offer this. But for the price it's not bad at all. Just dont expect amazing sound, this will not offer that.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Lally Jr

customer_reviews.title: Did not play all of my CDs
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty and sound quality was okay (though bass doesn't have the best quality). The best is the fact that has bluetooth. My only issue is the fact that it doesn't read all of my CDs... and that was the initial reason I bought it. :/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This retro CD system looks great on my bookcase!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new retro Vintage CD system. It really lights up the room with these beautiful neon colors. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Raccoon

customer_reviews.title: Husband bought this for my Christmas gift and really enjoy listening Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Husband bought this for my Christmas gift and really enjoy listening Very happy, sounds good, and looks great on night stand
customer_reviews.author: Mcbethie

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound and so very easy to use. I love the way it looks and makes me happy to see it lit up on my counter. So glad I ordered this for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son about a week ago and he loves it. He really likes all of the lights on it. So far we have only used the cd function and it works and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Duchess

customer_reviews.title: I love that it fits the style of an old time ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that it fits the style of an old time jukebox and has all the bells and whistles of a modern unit like: blue tooth enabled, CD player, and radio. What a great idea!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Have enjoyed this a lot. It looks great sitting on the counter in my kitchen and I can listen to it while I work. Thanks to reviews I bought it and am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Super neat!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't think of anything to get my husband for Christmas... so I bought this thing and made some old school mixed cd's to go with it. It's awesome. Super happy with it. We have parties in the summer and this will be a great addition to put on the porch so we have some music.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I had had it for a year or so now and it is still the same, it has a little problem with the light button, but i think I can fix it myself. I really love this the radio works awesome that was something important to me since I listen to a lot of radio shows. YOU WILL LOVE THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Mairyn Perez

customer_reviews.title: We want one of our own!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift to our 10 year old daughter for her room and it is perfect! The sound is excellent and she's able to connect via bluetooth with her tablet. Our son wants one now! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.Top Contributor: Camping

product_meta.title: Victrola Retro Desktop Jukebox with CD Player, FM Radio, Bluetooth, and Color Changing LED Lights, 15-Inch Tall
product_meta.description: Style:Nostalgic Jukebox - CD playerVictrola Retro Desktop Jukebox with CD Player, FM Radio, Bluetooth, and Color Changing LED Lights, 15-Inch Tall
feature_bullets: Classic old-time diner style 50's countertop Jukebox with real wood veneer
Retro color-changing LED light tubing in 7 bright colors.
Built-in Bluetooth wirelessly streams your favorite music from across the room. Up to 33 feet of range.
FM radio, USB, and SD card Reader.Do not install near any heat sources such as radiations, heat registers, stoves, or other apparatus (including amplifiers) that produce heat

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars963 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
